A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Now THIS is the Star Wars film I've always wanted to see:  My childhood heroes going against every piece of characterization and growth from the original three movies\, a pointless B-plot that feels like it lasts 45 minutes\, and characters who could solve every problem if they just talked to one-another.\n\nGood job letting Rian Johnson have free reign on this\, Disney.  Glad you care so much about your billion dollar darling.
